WorkItem.ClosedComment: The alpha-numeric key press is a feature of DataGridTextColumn. Template column does not enter edit mode through alpha-numeric key press since it does not know if there is a TextBox within it.
WorkItem.Description: When creating a custom column the events that trigger the edit mode are not the same as the non-custom columns. Particularly, the alpha-numeric key press does not begin edit mode. F2 seems to work and so does double mouse click.
WorkItem.Summary: Custom column template edit mode not working the same as packaged columns
